hooks.command:
bash -c 'mkdir -p .fewword/{scratch/{tool_outputs,subagents},memory/{plans,history,patterns,pinned},index} 2>/dev/null; if [ -d .git ] && ! grep -qE "^\.fewword(/|$)" .gitignore 2>/dev/null; then echo -e "
# FewWord context plugin
.fewword/scratch/
.fewword/index/" >> .gitignore 2>/dev/null && echo "[fewword] Added to .gitignore"; fi'

bash -c 'if [ -f .fewword/index/current_plan.yaml ] && grep -q "status: completed" .fewword/index/current_plan.yaml 2>/dev/null; then ts=$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S); mv .fewword/index/current_plan.yaml ".fewword/memory/plans/archived_${ts}.yaml" 2>/dev/null && echo "[fewword] Archived completed plan"; fi'
bash -c 'size=$(du -sm .fewword/scratch 2>/dev/null | cut -f1); if [ "${size:-0}" -gt 100 ]; then echo "[fewword] Warning: .fewword/scratch/ is ${size}MB - consider cleanup"; fi'
